mod.creator: Half Dragon
mod.name: Half Dragon Mod
mod.description: First release of the Half Dragon Mod V1.0

mod.creator: ShawnBarton
mod.name: Duckman's AI/Skirmish overhaul
mod.description: If you like halowars1 and want to play vs ai but cant due to the ai being terrible and want a new fresh take on the game's balance than this is the best mod out there for that. Every unit has been altered to fit the balance of this mod and make the ai much more difficult and most importantly uncheeseable. Play by yourself or with friends online against a new level of bots that will make you really need to play halowars1 at its fullest to defeat. This mod is meant for people looking for a fun challenge. One that doesn't cheat too hard like automatic ai difficulty does, but instead makes the bots more intelligent and consistent. Plenty of bug fixes that the base game had in it and many more viable strategies than the base game. Every unit should feel usable and effective as long as the situation calls for it. I really hope you enjoy as much as me and my friends have.

mod.creator: Samuelelelelele
mod.name: Halo Wars: Extreme
mod.description:
A more Extreme version of halo wars: definitive edition.. Created by Samuelelelelele. Features:
Pop cap: 10000 Starting money: 999999 Starting tech: 100 All upgrades are free and instant All units are free and takes no population All buildings cost 0 supplies and requires 0 tech All abilities for units now recharges instantly All leader abilities, like mac blast, odst drop and distruption bomb are now recharging instantly. Captain Cutter has 10000 odst to drop instead of the old 10 + he has 1000 mac blast ready to use. All unsc leaders can build up to 100 spartans + they can now hijack vultures and scarabs All unsc leaders also gets 2 new units All covenant leaders can build up to 10 leaders All rebels bases now has 4 turrets instead of 2 turrets and 2 watchtowers Captain Cutter, Forge and Anders can build heavy supply pads from the beginning Captain Cutter and Forge starts with fully upgraded base. All unsc leaders can upgrade to Grizzly, ODST and Hawks. If they upgrade to odst they will also get access to odst drop

mod.creator: Lord Nutritious
mod.name: Nutritious Edition
mod.description: A mod that attempts to change up the game by editing units and mechanics from base game while also adding some new units as well to make the overall experience new but familiar. Created by Lord Nutritious. Supply pads and turrets build faster. Added new base type for UNSC. Training time for all units is shorter. More units can fit in garrisons. All Infantry can go inside garrisons. Infantry move faster. Air units no longer die from Cyro bomb. Population values are changed. Added 35 new units. Added Many Weapon Types. 1 New UNSC leaders.

mod.creator: bbc6rgf57ytty5yx
mod.name: Playable Flood+Unit Pack
mod.description: Adds buildable Flood, Forerunner, Rebel units, bases and campaign units to Covenant and UNSC. Created by bbc6rgf57ytty5yx.

mod.creator: ScrubbaNubNub
mod.name: Spooky Edition
mod.description: Ever wanted to play Halo Wars but thought "man this game doesn't really fit the Halloween spirit"? While I'm sure you haven't, this mod has come to exist anyway because why the hell not. Please be aware that this mod is basically a reskin to the game; there are no new units, upgrades, maps, or anything else of the sort. This is simply a mod that modifies the maps and lighting slightly to make it all a little more eerie, while also having the Flood tracks playing on all Skirmish maps for that added touch. The campaign has also gotten the same lighting treatment, but the music is untouched to not interfere with mission scripts that may or may not override music.

mod.creator: ladywoodgrill
mod.name: Vanilla Spectator Mod
mod.description: This mod replaces the Random All option in the leader menu with a Spectator, allowing you to create unbalanced teams or to allow players to spectate a match.

mod.creator: Dread Core
mod.name: Desperate Desolation
mod.description: This is meant to be time consuming and difficult for pvp. (thats the fun part) All buildings and units have been altered to be stronger or weaker, rebels and sentinels are tough opponents now and flood has LOTS of numbers. supplies are precious, they are generated very slowly and everything is expensive. that may seem rediculous and it is but so are cyclopses. this mod is meant to take time and make you think about economy over strategy, i expect lots of bugs, please post any you find. WARNING: some lines of text have been changed and may be deceving and really stupid.

mod.creator: Kaid/six7six
mod.name: Kaid's Forerunner Mod
mod.description: Goal: To make the Forerunner Defense System function as a playable faction alongside the base/vanilla game factions. This is my first attempt at developing a fully fleshed out mod/addon for public use. I wanted to at least release my current build to start getting feedback on balancing. While testing against vanilla AI kind of works it is hard to gauge if prices and the tech progression fits in an actual multiplayer match.

mod.creator: TobyMac01
mod.name: Halo 3 Edition
mod.description: Now you may be wondering "Wtf is this mod about?" Well it's in the title to make Halo Wars more like Halo 3. This will range from some new units like different ranked elites, brute, and grunts and new vehicles like the fuel rod wraith. Units will now also use Halo 3 stats and new upgrades that correlate with Halo 3. This mod won't be balanced at first so one faction may be way stronger than the other, you have been warned!
